glsa.title: sendmail: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in sendmail could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information.

background.p: sendmail is a widely-used Mail Transport Agent (MTA).

description.p: The sm_close_on_exec function in conf.c has arguments in the wrong order.

impact.p: A local attacker could get access to unintended high-numbered file descriptors via a specially crafted program.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All sendmail users should upgrade to the latest version:
